definition: sentence/clause/phrase/classifier for phrases or lines of verse

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: In a sentence , participles can also be used as objective complements.
sentences.chinese: 在一個句子中分詞也可以作賓補。

sentences.english: The controls line up so that they can be read like an English sentence.
sentences.chinese: 控件整隊排列，使它們讀起來像一個英語句子。

sentences.english: This is a sentence or string phrase that has been encrypted.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個被加密的句子或字符串短語。

sentences.english: Previous research on the definite article has been conventionally confined to the sentential level of language.
sentences.chinese: 傳統的英語定冠詞研究是在句子的層面上進行的。

sentences.english: But in a sentence, it may not always mean that.
sentences.chinese: 但是在句子中，並不永遠是這樣的情況。

sentences.english: B. Pick out the proper nouns in the following sentences.
sentences.chinese: 試選出以下句子中的專有名詞。

sentences.english: We need a sentence letter, what should we have?
sentences.chinese: 我們與要一個句子的字母，應該是哪個呢？

sentences.english: Of course, there are many other sentence structures and many other languages.
sentences.chinese: 當然，還有許多其他的句子結構和其他的語言。

sentences.english: Use each of the above italicized phrases in sentences of your own.
sentences.chinese: 用以上斜體印出的短語各造一個句子。

sentences.english: A Complete these sentences using a or an.
sentences.chinese: 完成以下句子，用冠詞a或an填空。

sentences.english: Could these sentences be true together?
sentences.chinese: 這些句子能同時爲真嗎？

sentences.english: A long story can sometimes be condensed into a few sentences.
sentences.chinese: 一個長篇故事常常可以縮寫成幾個句子。

sentences.english: Underline the infinitives in the following sentences and tell their functions.
sentences.chinese: 用橫線劃出下列句子中的不定式，並說出它們的作用。

sentences.english: Please fill in the blanks in the sentence.
Rearrange the sentences in the story. Story 1.
sentences.chinese: 出示故事中的不按挨次臚列的句子。

sentences.english: In English, question words go in the beginning of the sentence.
sentences.chinese: 在英文裏，疑問詞是在句子的頭上。

definition: part of speech (noun, verb, adjective etc)/lexical category
